nodes.text: The Isiring system was located in the star cluster that eventually became the Tendrannan sector, a subsector of the Cassander sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The star system was situated on the Braxant Run hyperlane, which linked it to the New Bakstre system as well as the Vuchelle system of the Atrivis sector.

The Isiring system contained a mining world of the same name. Between 4 ABY and 12 ABY, the system was situated in the territory of the Pentastar Alignment, and it fell within the borders of the Imperial Remnant between 12 ABY and 13 ABY.
The Isiring system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-5.
